section.15: The Book of Shortening the Prayer When Traveling

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Umar said:"The prayer for jumu'ah is two rak'ahs, and for Al-Fitr is two rak'ahs, and for An-Nahr is two rak'ahs, and for traveling is two rak'ahs, complete and not shortened, on the tongue of the Prophet (ï·º)
